subject: struts unit test
msgSnippet: Hi All i am working on unit testing of struts. it is successfully run but one problem is there verifyForward is not working. it shows error like
messageBody:
Hi All

i am working on unit testing of struts.
it is successfully run
but one problem is there
verifyForward is not working.
it shows error like

java.lang.NoSuchMethodError:
org.apache.struts.config.ForwardConfig.getModule()Ljava/lang/String;

wait for reply

--
Thanks & Regards,

Pankaj Khare
QA Engineer
Rishabh Software Pvt. Ltd.
